EmailTemplate.subject: Event Planners Needed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Events 4 Youth are currently recruiting keen young people aged of 16-25 who have what it takes to plan and run events for young people in the community.
This fantastic opportunity is suitable for those who are interested in events planning & management.
You will be given training and guidance throughout the planning process and will also have the chance to gain a level 2 ASDAN and accredited First Aid Training from the British Red Cross.
In order to be a part of this fantastic opportunity you will have to be:
· Living in Hounslow
· creative
· committed
· enjoy events
· good team player
· able to attend sessions
· Ready to have fun!
Planning sessions start on;
· Thursday 27th February
· @ The volunteer centre Hounslow, 45 Treaty Centre, high street Hounslow, TW3 1ES
· From 6pm
Planning sessions will be held on a weekly basis.
To join, or to ask any questions contact Sara @ Events 4 Youth:
sara@hfvc.org.uk
07849 893 604/ 0207 741 9876
Enjoy!
Rob The Challenge Society
